website_summaries.verdict: This double breast pump offers strong suction, premium construction, and many other great features.
pros: Double breast pump comes with a high-definition screen that allows you to monitor suction level, time, status, and other information
Touch panel allows you to operate the pump with 1 finger
Includes a high-powered, built-in lithium-ion battery
Emits a working noise level that is lower than 45 decibels
Lightweight pump is ideal for traveling
cons: May need to press down hard on the double breast pump's switch to activate the device

customer_reviews.title: Great portability, can adapt to use Freemie cups
customer_reviews.text: Really great size, small and compact while still being very powerful. It actually hurt just a little when I first used it. Power is comparable to my hospital grade Medela symphony and Spectra S2 with even more suction modes. I was able to use Spectra adapter tubing to use this pump with Freemie cups making it ultra portable! Yay! The battery lasts for at least 3 20-min pumping sessions and doesn't seem to lose much suction power in that time. It's great for a work or car pump. I felt I was taking a risk in buying it at fisrt but it's turned out to be a fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cdpips

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Strong
customer_reviews.text: Ive been exclusively pumping and bottle feeding my little one and needed a light, transportable pump. Majority of the electric pumps I found were either too heavy to carry around or too expensive. I took a chance and bought this brand and don't regret it one bit. Yes, there are a lot of parts to wash just like any other pump machines. However, it's strong (even when I'm double pumping) and the battery life lasts for a while at full charge. Even better is the fact that it's actually affordable
customer_reviews.author: Alice K.

customer_reviews.title: Great primary or to go pump
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little pump! I have a spectra s1 and I love the bellababy for on the go pumping sessions- exactly what I was looking for. Definitely glad I didn't splurge on Baby Buddha or Spectra S9. I tried bellababy for an entire day and I didn't lose any ounces. The only downfall is there is no way to decrease suction power. I have to unplug if I want to decrease, but that's not a big issue for me; so overall, I'm very happy with this purchase. Note: I used my pumpin pals and spectra parts as the original parts didn't work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: J.Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit after our Son was born. We were looking to pump just because of the convenience and ability to rotate formula with breast milk and I found several pumps similar to this one that were $160 - $200. Checked on Amazon and found this pump that looked very nice by comparison and had a much much better price. It was Prime so delivery was fast and it came with good instructions. Everything has worked flawlessly on it and have found great success with the different settings. My wife uses it at least twice a day. Would definitely recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ranzo

customer_reviews.title: Get this and throw out your free insurance pump.
customer_reviews.text: When I started back to work after having my baby I started pumping more frequently. I started worrying that my milk supply had dropped because I was hardly getting anything when I pumped. A friend suggested I get a new pump. I was naive and thought surely it couldn't be my pump, it must just be me. But I went ahead and ordered this pump. Long story short... I now pump around 4 oz more in an 8 hour shift with this pump than I did with the worthless pump my insurance gave me. (Yes, a whole 4oz more)
customer_reviews.author: LannaM

customer_reviews.title: Great little portable pump!
customer_reviews.text: Having used a Spectra S2, I was really looking for something more portable and equally powerful. I must say this pump fits my need just perfectly. Battery lasts for about three 15-20 min sessions. Parts can be cleaned easily. Noise level is pretty manageable. The touch screen is definitely sensitive, so be careful around it. I have used it on a plane, in the park, at home with no issues. Had initial trouble with the machine. Sent a feedback and left a review on Amazon. Customer service got in touch and replaced it. Overall a good purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Riddhi Todi

customer_reviews.title: Would somewhat recommend
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is good. For the price you can’t go wrong. Be nipple-ready by applying a safe cream, lanolin, or coconut oil over the nipples or you will be terrified at the very strong suction. Some reviewers mentioned having a nipple bleed after using this (scary). Breastfeeding is hard already and shouldn’t be so uncomfortable; otherwise, you won’t get anything out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time/money
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for and this is no exception. I bought this the week before I delivered so I wa prepared for post partum. The first time I tried it I assumed I didn’t know how to use it because nothing happened- the machine made its sound but there was absolutely no suction. I watched YouTube videos and disassembled and reassembled it. I read the questions here and with any malfunction the answer was “contact seller.” Don’t want to contact seller want a working product!! Was pretty frustrated bc I desperately needed to pump. Sent back & do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: This must be how cows feel. Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Spend the money on a larger brand pump! My trusty Pump In Style died with my third baby and I saw all of the good reviews for this pump, along with the cheap price and thought I’d give it a try. The mechanism for pumping the milk is very different than the better known brand pumps I used at home and at the hospital. It was incredibly painful. I tried using it a couple of times thinking there would be a learning curve, but it was just too painful. Now it sits in a corner until I can bring myself to just throw it away. It was confusing to turn on, the settings are tricky, and everything hurts.
customer_reviews.author: SGilbert

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this if your looking for something quite or portable
customer_reviews.text: Terrible not sure how it got such high ratings, well I fell for it. Very large and bulky def not portable of convenient. Touch screen very sensitive if you graze the power button will shut off so can not put it in your pocket or anything and the tubes are very short.There are sevral extra pieces you have to wash with every use. And lastly it is not quiet! Sounds like a dieing cow. I hope I get my money back a total waste. Sine returning this product they keep sending me emails to entice me to delete my review no wonder all the reviews were so good when I looked into orginally purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D.

customer_reviews.title: Probably the worst pump I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what you expect from the previous reviews. The flanges are really short and only come in one size, never mind they get almost cut off and made even smaller half way down the flange. It's small but the screen is super sensitive so it's not exactly easy to carry around. If you try to hack it and use other flanges you loose a crazy amount of suction. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rich L.

customer_reviews.title: Over all a good little pump for on the go moms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted something that didn’t need to be plugged in Pros: Small Light weight Multiple settings way more then my spectra 2 or my medela free style Seems to have enough power USB charges which is amazing Cons: Loud! I do not like the massage pieces that come with it to cover the flanges milk gets trapped and leaks all over Only comes with one size flange and I do not believe they sell other sizes the wrong sizes flange and affect your milk supply Shipping took 9 days Top heavy
customer_reviews.author: Iowamom83

customer_reviews.title: Power cord not included
customer_reviews.text: A power cord was not included and the item was not pre-charged since it's not turning on. I assumed a power cord would have been included there for I can not use it till i figure out what I can use to charge this with.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Very painful. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am really trying to understand how this has 4 stars. This was SO painful to use!! I tried it a couple times! NO milk came out and I thought my nipples would rip off. I will go back to using my spectra. This was incredibly painful.
customer_reviews.author: MEdelight

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me all.
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked correctly on this pump, I tried all the settings several times for ~ 20, the flanges were the right size, but I could never get more than a few drops each time and it was painful, I followed up pumping with my medela and got six ounces. Even tried using my compatible medela flanges and still no dice. Would of been perfect if it had actually worked.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy - nipples started to bleed
customer_reviews.text: My nipples started bleeding,too strong suction power and I wasn’t able to lower the suction level. Returning this
customer_reviews.author: Shilpa K

customer_reviews.title: Compact, portable pump
customer_reviews.text: I live in a city that requires a lot of driving. I got this pump looking for something that would be pretty portable. This ouno fits that need perfectly. The silicone pads in the flange is a nice benefit. I'm going to try them on my Spectra at home too.
customer_reviews.author: Will & Jackie Parr

customer_reviews.title: Found hair in the box
customer_reviews.text: I am very upset that I did not get a chance to use this pump since I needed it in time for work. When I received the box I noticed there was hair in it and I didn't even get to rip the plastic off. For sanitary reasons I hope someone can explain this.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Wow does this hurt.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this pump hurts!!!! I am using it in level 1 and the battery at half way full, hoping it won't hurt as much. Its has too many parts like the tubing. I am using the pump with my Medela parts because it's just one suction tube that connects direct to the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Garcia

customer_reviews.title: NEVER worked. returned it immediately after receiving. wife is Not happy!!
customer_reviews.text: NEVER worked. returned it immediately after receiving. wife is Not happy!! followed all the instructions. charged unit for 2 hours, display showed it to have a full battery. device did not turn on-not once!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlito B

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love it but it’s a no
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. Most of the reviews were great. I have a spectra S2 and usually get 6-7 ounces per pump session. With this pump I would get less than an ounce. I’m not sure why exactly the suction seemed strong but it just didn’t work for me. And I honestly didn’t think it was very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Roehrig

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst breast pump i’ve used, I would not recommend this to anybody. I have a great supply and this pump was a waist it’s not suctioning the way it should and it’s very loud and annoying. The only good thing about this pump is that it has a timer on it allowing you to see how long you’ve pumped. I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible suction quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible suction. More difficult to put together than more expensive pumps. Definitely will return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible suction
customer_reviews.text: I already own a Spectra breast pump, which works perfectly. I purchased this pump because I thought it would allow me more freedom of movement. This device was beyond disappointing. Terrible suction and very loud. I pump every day and this device barely suctioned any milk. I switched back to my Spectra and a ton of milk came out.
customer_reviews.author: Shireenliberty

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction, comfortable, portable and affordable! With great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Had issues with my initial purchase, and returned the product due to an issue with the adapter. customer service reached out and provided me with a completely new system. I’m so pleased so far,being an exclusive pumper I love that I get more milk out with my baby Bella than with my regular pump, and it’s super comfortable and convenient. I like being able to move around while I pump and It’s quick to pack up for use in the car. I’m hoping this will last
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Doubt, Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I’m going to say this but this $50 (got it on sale) pump is way better than my $300 pump! The suction is really strong but not painful and the best part is the ultra comfy massage cushion. This pump can empty my breast really well compared to the more expensive pump. It is easy to carry around and I can do so much more because of its portability. If you are having second thoughts whether to buy this or not, don’t! This would be the best Amazon purchase you’ll ever have.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are inaccurate. Terrible pump.
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed upon opening the box was that there is a note asking buyers to review the product in order to receive $15. I knew I'd made a mistake at that moment. This pump is not great. It has a decent suction, but it's so machine like (and loud) that it just doesn't achieve a let down. The settings are very awkward and you can only turn them up, not down. Also, they are easy to accidentally press... which seems like a terrible combination. Overall, it's kind of stressful to use this pump, which means you're just not going to get much milk out of it. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Wickedawesomely

customer_reviews.title: The suction is horrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The suction on this thing sucks!!! It’s horrible!!! It says not to put more than 10 minutes at a time. Had to pump 20 minutes and get 2 ounces and still be able to manually express more ounces of milk. I I am on the second week postpartum and I’m starting to get swelling because I can’t empty. The portability is awesome, you can take anywhere especially if you have multiple children. One more thing I love is the massage function on this pump it really helps when trying to getting the lumps out.
customer_reviews.author: Carmacitta Hallmon

customer_reviews.title: Worked but had a few problems.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price but had a few problems. I had to take the cushions off as milk kept getting under them. I also had to press them against my breasts. This is the only pump I've tried so I'm not sure of the reason but it made my nipples sore too. I couldn't use a high setting even though milk expression was not that good. I don't know if that has to do with my breasts or the machine. It would also switch pump settings and I kept having to change it back while expressing. Also there wasn't very good instructions included.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Does the job good enough. Has some cons as well..
customer_reviews.text: As many first time moms, I had no experience using a pump. Here is my take on it. - Device is small and portable - Great variety of massaging and suction levels - Charges quickly - I have large breasts, and the silicone breast pads are too small for me. - It's painful. However to ease discomfort, I lubricate my entire areola and nipples with emu oil before use. - Flange size too small - So many parts to clean ( just with any breast pump ) Not the most efficient when very tired, and on a pumping schedule. I would of loved to use it more often as I should, however I hand express mostly now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisanne Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Nice contruction - doesn't work well!
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to buy this based on how nice it looks for the price. Now i understand why its so cheap. It has multiple levels of suction and none of them even the strongest was enough to pull milk out, not even close. We wanted to make sure it was us so we tried our old one again and it worked fine. I would not recommend buying this one. Just spend the extra money and get a really good one. I was really hoping to like this product but it just doesn't do the job. We tried charging it to full battery and everything and never pulled a drop of milk out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product HOWEVER...
customer_reviews.text: This product so far (I have only used it twice) is great HOWEVER, the flanges only come in 24 mm... Which causes my nipples to get blisters! Oh and don't believe any of the "massage" claims this pump states. PUMPING IS BY NO MEANS A NIPPLE MASSAGE! It pinches and it hurts! I do love that there are 6 strengths and four different pump types though! It's also awesomely SMALL so it's GREAT for on the go!!
customer_reviews.author: GiGi Eats

customer_reviews.title: It "sucks" but in an awesome way!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!!! The battery life is awesome, it's not that loud and the suction options are endless (well not really). Received a free pump through our insurance but tossed it after ordering this one. The flange it came with didnt fit and theres no option for bigger sizes so I found one that fits through maymom on amazon. Just needed to pull the white tips off the bellababy hoses and the maymom (for spectra 1 and 2) backflow preventer and bigger flange work seamlessly! They make bigger and smaller sizes. This pump is super cheap but it packs a punch! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joey S

customer_reviews.title: A must have for pumping moms
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have!! I have a double spectra 2 and this pump has a much harder suction on it than my spectra. This is handy as the battery/pump is small and lightweight. Ive pumped in the car traveling and its the one next to my bed for middle of night pump and its quiet. I have a newborn and a 1 yr old and it wakes neither nor my husband. The price is spectacular. And the battery lasts 2 days for me. I pump every 3-4 hours 20 min at a time. I've put the spectra on ememrgbecy use only lol.. because I pump 2 oz more using this pump
customer_reviews.author: 5babiesMomma

customer_reviews.title: Seller hides bad reviews.It CONSTANTLY LEAKS AIR;YOU WILL NEVER PUMP ENOUGH MILK! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: The seller hid this review! Dont spend your money on this pump. This pump is surely a let down. Each time I've used this pump, it doesnt suction out enough milk ( I know this because I've switch to a manual pump and gotten more milk from it). I've also notice that alot of air escapes from the tee joint. No matter how hard I press the cover down, it never stays on and pops off. I feel like I've wasted money
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Williams

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I returned this item after using it twice. I have used a Medela in the past without any issues, but I wanted to see if another pump would be more efficient. This one was not. 1. Too. Many. Parts. Taking this apart was tedious and annoying. 2. Suction was not only an odd pulsation but it did hurt at the levels necessary to pump milk, and I didn’t achieve any letdowns after ten minutes. 3. Indifferent to the noise level. The only thing I liked about it was the portability of the chargeable base.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda.b.rand

customer_reviews.title: VERY strong suction, beware
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I bought this quickly as a friend recommended and my pump was delayed through insurance as baby due date moved up. I didn’t know any better bc I’m a first time mom but holy s#^! This thing could rip a nipple off compared to my Spectra which was so much more gentle and I got better output. If you need or want LOTS of strong suction, then this is perfect. One downside is you have to keep going up in strength to get back down so be careful. It’s also very noisy in comparison to other pumps. Super durable equipment though and the portable piece is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Ter Wee

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectation
customer_reviews.text: This pump exceeded my expectation! I have a spectra s1 that I love but I needed a smaller one to take with on the plane. This pump has 4 different modes you can choose from. Also, I like the added accessories: silicone on the flanges(not too hard on breasts), lid for the flanges and a stability stand for the bottles. Noise level is a bit noisier than spectra but it didn’t really matter if pumping on plane. Battery lasts 4-5 12-15minute pumps. Great deal for a good quality pump!
customer_reviews.author: Sweetdee777

customer_reviews.title: Better than medela
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite pump I bought one with my first baby last year and loved it it’s portable. Easy clean up and it’s more quiet than most pumps but it sounds kinda like a cow moo. I liked it enough to buy a new one this year since I just gave birth, I do still have my old one but they don’t have the tubing for sale for this pump anywhere which is dissapointing so I just got a whole new pump and I’ll use the extra parts from my old one if needed. Definitely reccomend this pump. You can legit walk around while pumping it’s so portable
customer_reviews.author: scottt lestarge

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this pump exclusively for the past few days and I don’t think I’ll continue. The suction is Waaayyyyy too strong! There are 4 different suction types and two of them I can’t even handle so I feel like that’s a waste. The pump is small but not so small that you can hang it around your neck or waist, which is why I bought it in the first place. My biggest issue is that it’s a touch screen and it’s EXTREMELY sensitive. I always accidentally turn up the suction. You then have to go all the way to the highest suction to get back to the lower ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna H

customer_reviews.title: Painful & Not Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Overall, very disappointed in this product. Yes, it was easy to bring places. But it killed my milk supply. The suction was painful and it didn’t empty well. I barely had any supply after I got home from my trip. I’d planned to continue to use it for convenience when I’m out and about but I’m truly concerned about whether it will even work. Definitely not worth the $70 and I would never order it again. It served its purpose for my trip, and I’ll never use it again.
customer_reviews.author: R Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: After searching for months, I finally decided to go with this pump because of the reviews and the most purchased one on Amazon. I was very excited to get this, but I've not even had it 2 weeks yet, used it 5 times and it just out of the blue completely stopped working. Does absolutely nothing at all now, so it was money wasted for me. Hopefully I just got a bad one of the bunch and it doesn't happen to any other new mommy's. It did amazing what time it did work though :(
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Vanover

customer_reviews.title: Just spend the extra money & get another pump
customer_reviews.text: I liked the pump at first. But now that I've had it for a while I do not recommend it. I plan to buy another pump because this one is loud & that would be OK if it actually semi emptied my boobs! When they fill up & are hurting. This pump will only take the edge off & then I have to use my hand pump by medela. I plan on trying the lan pump! Hopefully it goes better! So far this one has reduced my milk supply even with pumping more i still get less milk & I don't understand it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Save your money toward a higher end pump!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this pump might have been very portable. But the suction was basically non existent when not plugged in, and only held a "strong" charge for less than 10 minutes during the first use. Going back ASAP. Had to go to Walmart and pick up a Medela pump in an emergency. And that pump works really well. Live and learn. And get what you pay for I guess!
customer_reviews.author: Jody S.

customer_reviews.title: Best breast pump ever!
customer_reviews.text: I had twin boys that were in the nicu so the hospital gave me a temporary hospital grade Medela pump. I also got a medela pump covered by my insurance. However, I still wanted a portable pump and the battery pack had terrible suction. So I bought this gem and boy is it a life changer!!! I returned the hospital grade and put away the other one because I use this one every time. It’s affordable and has great suction. It really makes all of your milk come out. I will 10/10 recommend this to someone every time. It is also compatible with avent bottles so that’s a huge plus for me!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Love at first pump!
customer_reviews.text: **Edit** This is a perfect pump, except it's a little loud. Hold a charge well. I use it about 5x a day and charge it every 3 days or so. I didn't respind to any other electric pumps, and this is great! **Edited to say, I'm a little irritated there's no way to contact seller. Its now be 6 months. And my battery doesn't hold charge like it did and is crazy loud. It needs to be replaced, but theres no way to contact anyone about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamee

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a gift so I'm writing review off of what she stated :-) She said she LOVES it. The sucktion power is amazing and better than the previous one she owned with her son. She loves all the different setting. She doesn't have to charge too often as it lasts for about 2 days worth. The noise isn't as bad as some but its not too loud. She HIGHLY recommends this brand, her FAVORITE by far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: So i love this pump- let me start off by saying I’ve pumped over 25,000oz and have used 5 different pumps. This is BY FAR my favorite. The suction setting 1- that’s let down mode 2- that’s rip your nipple off mode 3- heaven in the form of a massage/expression mode 4- mix between letdown mode and rip your nipples off mode Needless to say, skip that 2nd setting If you value your nipples- and trust me- I’m ALL for suction in a pump but that was a lot haha Still the best pump I’ve used hands down and i will keep recommending it over and over!!
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom

customer_reviews.title: A great and powerful pump, but you may need some accessory adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pump and is an excellent price. The ssuction is very powerful, so I mostly use lower settings. I'm giving it four stars because the flanges are only available in one size that do not fit me. I've just used the flanges and backflow protectors from my spectra. Also (and the most disappointing to me) the charging port is glitch. Sometimes I plug is in and walk away, not realizing that it isn't charging. I have to jiggle the cord and settle it just right to get charging to engage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pump!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bella baby! Great pump for the price! I’m able to bring the pump with me when i work: travel and have even been able to pump in the car! It has great suction and is comparable to my Medela in style. The battery life is great! I was able to use mine several times a day for 2 days going into the 3rd without charging it. Cons: I wish it had a clip to secure it to your waists. It’s not very quiet. The cushion inserts get milk trapped behind them. Overall if you’re on the fence about buying this pump, i say go for it! I wasn’t disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Colby/Jennifer Massey

customer_reviews.title: You Won’t Be Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had multiple breast pumps, some of the most expensive name brand ones, and by far this is my favorite! I was hesitant, because it was so affordable but I love it! I have G cup breasts and I have no problem using this pump, it’s very comfortable. The suction is great and I love how small and portable it is. The pump itself isn’t super quiet but that doesn’t bother me and Baby seems to enjoy the White noise.
customer_reviews.author: Still Family

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother if youre small chested to begin with. What a hassle.
customer_reviews.text: Not for the small chested women. This is the most difficult pump to deal with, you constantly have to be holding it otherwise it leaks from the bottom AND milk gets inbetween the cup and the silicone cover that goes over your breast, so milk gets everywhere, i developed an awful rash from the milk getting on my breast tissue. Ive tried all the tricks to the trade. The battery doesnt last long on this, either. Forget double pumping, you have to block one end of the suction while you pump one breast at a time. The suction is that bad when trying to double pump. Pumping shouldn't be this difficult or stressful.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Bloody blistered nipples
customer_reviews.text: I have not used another brand, but I am looking into a more known one. It is portable if you have loose pockets and VERY carefully slip it in, just dont bump it or tap it and make sure your short lines dont kink. The bottles are very top heavy, I've finished pumping half asleep and put them on the counter just to have them fall over. The suction is super strong! I've thrown away a couple ounces of milk because the milk was too bloody, both nipples blistered up now they look pretty scarred. And the cushions suck! Constantly slipping off causing suction to stop. This machine hurts! But it has gotten the job done for the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective and Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but it really does nothing for me. The levels go from no suction to painful. I have a spectra I love, but I bought this for the road trip I’m on so I could pump in the car. The “comfort” silicone pads aren’t comfortable to me, and also the milk splashes up and gets in between the flange and pads, which is just a big mess to me. It’s just uncomfortable all around, and not effective for me. I wish I spent the money and purchased the Freemie.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lemoine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Exclusive Pumping
customer_reviews.text: If you're an exclusive pumper, or going to be pumping while away from baby, you need this pump! I have the Spectra S2 that I received through my insurance, but purchased this pump for traveling and to go with my Freemies. Honestly, I like this pump more than my Spectra. It empties my breasts more effectively and efficiently than the Spectra, plus it's portable! I've only had the pump for a few days, so I can't speak to the battery life or longevity, but so far I love it! I will says it's much louder than the Spectra S2 so I cannot use it at night and it wouldn't be discrete if you're in public, but I'm OK with that.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Compact, portable and powerful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did I just find the most compact, portable, powerful breast pump for under $60?!?!? I was obsessing over finding the right pump for me, for months. This is my last baby and I wanted the most convenient, easy to use, portable pump I could find. Thankfully Amazon came through for me, as this Bella baby pump popped up as a suggestion. I read review after review, watched videos, and decided to purchase it with the thought that at least I can use for when we travel if nothing else. But I’m so happy with it, I don’t know if I will even use my other pump I have through my insurance.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Enkoji

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pump based on the good reviews but I wish I would have kept looking Pros: 1. Affordable on any budget 2.Pumps both breast at once. 3. Shuts off automatically after 30 mins. Cons: 1. The vibration sound is annoying. 2. The suction isn't that good. 3. I have to charge it every second pump session.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Justine

customer_reviews.title: Works great, has a very strong suction (almost too strong)
customer_reviews.text: This pumps works well. I like that it can be plugged into the wall, into the car or used with batteries. My only complaint is that the suction is VERY strong. This is my 4th child and I've pumped with each. In the past I would use the strong suction settings with other brands, but this one... I've have to stay on level 1 or 2. There also isn't any "stimulation" ahead of time, so if you start pumping before the letdown has come, then it hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Tiny but mighty. I used the BabyBella for the first time today around the house. I really like the different suction patterns. It will take me some time to figure out which is best for me and when. The different levels of suction are strong for such a small machine. The "quirks": I picked it up, and twice setting it down it turned off. I'm not sure if I accidentally hit the power button or jostled it too much when setting down. The ounces labeled on the bottle aren't the same volume compared to other bottles I use. Good machine and I'll continue to use it when I want to be out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disappointed with this product, i finally got to use it as i came home from the hospital with my child only to find out it doesn’t work wirelessly and refuses to work even when it says it’s 100% charged. The minute i unplug it it doesn’t work. I get it that you get what you pay for it just sucks because now i need one and i have to figure out what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Totally.nicki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Little Pump That Fits In The Palm Of Your Hand!
customer_reviews.text: Wow..did not expect the power from this little thing! Suction is STRONG. Love that it has so many different suction functions/levels. I always use the highest setting on my main pump at home and wow...can’t go past level 3 with this one. Love the size/portability. I needed a second pump to take to work when I go back and it’s perfect. Needed to find one that was not bulky and would be easily transported. The pump itself is about the size of a dish sponge, just thicker. JUST what I needed! It’s definitely louder than my Motif Luna but it’s nothing I would dock it for. Awesome little pump! Very affordable for the quality. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Aguillon

customer_reviews.title: I want to get another pump...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: many levels, suction good I guess, USB charge Cons: one pump will not work by itself, must have both pumps connected for one to work, flange size (24mm) is too big for me- hard to find an insert for this particular style-Maymom 17 mm hard to insert due to the way the flange is built at the end. I just might get another pump that I can customize for my size.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin and Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing multiple double electric breast pumps we decided this one was a winner! We were won over by the price as well as the multiple settings. It’s very easy to clean and to use. It took a little bit to get use to the settings but I’ve got it down after a few sessions. I’ve been pumping at least five times a day for 15 minutes and the battery life has been great. I love that we are able to recharge and not waste batteries. Cleaning this set up is simple as well. I couldn’t be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Compatible to spectra S2!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. I regularly use the Spectra S2 hospital grade but needed something small and portable. So far it has pulled more milk each pump than my spectra. It has multiple settings to help initiate multiple letdowns. The only con I have found is the sound. It’s slightly louder than my spectra but not terrible. I’m able to place the pump in a fanny pack and connect it to its flanges, my spectra flanges or the closed system Freemie Cups and walk around doing my regular activities. Would definitely recommend to any momma. Especially since the price is crazy cheap in comparison to other pumps!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Orta

customer_reviews.title: Daughter-in-law LOVES IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my son and daughter-in-law and she loves it. She loves that it is a double pump and has several Different settings. This pump is just as good as the $2-300.00 breast pumps. It’s easy to sterilize and it is also portable so she can take it to work with her. It’s a nice compact size. So glad I found this for them.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Like it better than Medela
customer_reviews.text: I used the Medela Pump In Style for my last baby. I used that breastpump every 4 hours for a year. For this baby I decided to try Bellababy Double Electric Breast because of the price. I won't say I love it, because...who loves pumping? NO ONE. But it does work so very well. I am impressed with the different functions and how it starts off so gentle and then ever so slowly you can work up to some serious suction power! I've only used it for 6 weeks so far, so I can't comment on endurance, but if you're looking for a pump, this is a great place to start.
customer_reviews.author: BChild

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pump!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I went with this pump! After reading a lot of the reviews this seemed like the best budget friendly choice, not to mention super user friendly as well! The directions on how to set up and use are pretty basic, the pump itself is simple and strong. My newborn is having trouble latching, so my milk wasn't flowing. This pump definitely got things going and has not only helped me produce milk for my little one, but it also helped my nipples come out more and it helping with her latching. I highly recommend this pump over pricier name brand ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Decent pump
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pump for 3 months. It works decently. I prefer the vibration-type suction of the spectra, but this pump does empty me and it's portable which is nice! A downside is the buttons are very sensitive! I'm used to it now, but at first, I would accidentally turn it off mid-pump. I use spectra parts with the pump because the flanges it came with are too big for me. The spectra parts work great with it! It also works with the freemie closed system cups. Overall: this pump isn't top of the line, but it's also much ore affordable then some of the top brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pump!
customer_reviews.text: Where was this point when I purchased the Medela one. I purchased Medela for my first kid and stop working after a couple of months. Searching for a new pump I came across this one. It's cheap but it has amazing suction and the fact that you can recharge even in your car makes it super portable. I wanted to make it more portable so I purchased the freemie cups (closed system only) and my life couldn't be more eased. I wish I had this pump 2.5 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: GabsNv

customer_reviews.title: Prefect small pump!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this pump! With the price being on the lower end, I was skeptical of this pump. I wanted to purchase a second pump for home and use the pump I got through insurance for work; so I didnt need anything too crazy and the price was perfect. The device itself is small and compact. I like the option to pump in a bottle or right into a bag. I also like how there is some silicone/rubber insert in the flanges. My insurance pump doesnt have these two bonuses. This pump will be convenient if I need to pump while getting ready or on my commute to work.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea1483

customer_reviews.title: Great portable pump
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t this pump long, but so far so good. I purchased this pump to take back and forth to work. To be a portable rechargeable pump it works pretty good! My only complaint is the top suction pieces tend to come off when pumping, not sure how I can get them to stay on. The shield protectors are nice if you have smaller breast, but if not they are useless. I also wish it came with another size cup, but for someone with DDD’s the shield works perfectly fine (without the nice protectors). Overall it was worth the $60 (now $50, 4 days later, which I also don’t understand)
customer_reviews.author: Martinique

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor quality. Parts do not fit together easily at all. Does not come with a charger. Do not waste your money. This is nowhere at all similar to Baby Buddha Breast pump. I was so dissatisfied after opening and seen quality that I immediately returned.
customer_reviews.author: MeaDodd

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad pump
customer_reviews.text: I liked the closed system, easy to use, modern touch screen monitor and you can connect directly to a breastmilk storage bag. I disliked the pump did not come with wall plug in charger (had to have my own to connect to USB), suction cups were short ( not enough space for nipple), and for some reason it did not pump as well as my medela. My medela was not a closed system, therefore, I wanted to try this. Medela pumped better eventhough it only has 1 setting (this pump has several).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little thing
customer_reviews.text: So I got this to replace my Lansinoh smartpump. This Bellababy is a HUGE improvement from my other pump. It does take a bit of adjusting (I probably just have very weird boobs) but I'm able to pump 5 ounces in about 20 minutes on a good pump. All in all, I am very happy with this purchase. I only wish they'd have included screw-on caps for the bottles, so you can pump and store the bottle in the fridge. Oh, and I think the noise level is acceptable, if you care about that sort of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great Portability
customer_reviews.text: My main pump is the Spectra, but I wanted something more portable to use while commuting. I was able to use this pump with the freemie cups and it works great to pump in the car. I appreciate all the different setting. Yes, it can be annoying that you have to go through all the different levels to get back to the lowest one, but I don't find it to be that big of an issue. Definitely worth the price if you plan on pumping while commuting or traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Biwer

customer_reviews.title: Very portable!
customer_reviews.text: I love my pump! It’s small to fit in my purse when I go to work. It is a little noisier than I would like but I can charge it at night, pack it in my bag quickly and also set up quickly. Very portable. It works just like a hospital grade expensive pump. If you’re on a budget, perfect! I needed rest from breastfeeding I ordered it to start getting some bottles made up so my husband can take some shifts at night waking up with our newborn. It arrived within a day. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jymon

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: The item working great. It has different modes which allows you to adjust them when you are using it. Little tip for buyers: Lv4 is of the first mode(massage mode),Lv3 is of the fourth mode(normal pumping mode).When turn on the machine,the default mode is the first mode to massage breasts lightly for 2 mins,then after 2 mins,it will automatically to normal mode to pump milk faster.If don't want the switch,you could skip the massage mode and use the fourth mode directly.
customer_reviews.author: ning chen

customer_reviews.title: Love that it's portable
customer_reviews.text: This breast pump works great! I've had a few different pumps over the years and this one is just as good as a hospital grade Medela. I love how the silicone cups don't fall out or slip off like some. Also it has plenty of adjustments for your need. The only suggestion for future models that I would make would be to have the pumping cords that connect from the pumps to the machine, they need to be a bit longer so that you can set the machine part on the table next to you while pumping instead of on your lap or arm rest.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Washington

customer_reviews.title: BEST VALUE NO BULK
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! In comparison to the Medela you can't go wrong with this product! NOT BULKY, STRONG SUCTION, EASY TO USE Suction has several settings and intensities making pumping less stressful. Pump at your own pace! The suction cups have silicone padding for added comfort which are also removable. Battery life is excellent and I could use on the go anytime. The pump is compatible with PHILIPS AVIENT bottles for added versatility! Noise is not bothersome but is audible, not enough to wake a sleeping baby or partner!
customer_reviews.author: Icouldbeanyone

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and you can use other flanges with it.
customer_reviews.text: This product has really strong suction for a battery powered unit, which I appreciate. I’m not crazy about the flanges. They have a silicone cushion liner that helps stimulate the breast while pumping but I found milk became trapped between the liner and the flange, I have to use 21mm flanges with my spectra so that could be why I was having an issue. The flanges can be used without the cushions but they’re too big for me. However I was able to hook up my spectra flanges to the unit and that’s how I use it. It’s really convenient at work and in the car, I don’t have to lug my spectra all over.
customer_reviews.author: Breanne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a game changer for exclusively pumping! I use this pump with open system freemie cups and it’s made pumping MUCH easier & less lonesome. The pump is a little on the loud side and touch screen is VERY sensitive but nothing beats the freedom you get with using this pump. The pump automatically shuts off after 30 minutes and one full battery charge I can usually get 3-4pumps. Comes with a charger that uses a USB so you can charge it in the car. Suction is POWERFUL! Very pleased with this product and well worth the $60!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this- I am super impressed. I exclusively pump and usually use the Spectra S2 but it is a little hard to travel with. I wanted something that would be easier to bring around with me. This is super small so it doesn't take up a lot of room in your bag. There are a lot of different suction strengths and patterns to use. It is a little noisy which is disappointing, but still totally worth it. The only thing that I have noticed is that it will randomly lose its fit so it needs to be adjusted. Everything is easy to clean as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, but funnels aren't big enough
customer_reviews.text: I saw all of the great reviews on this pump and chose it. This pump hurt so bad for me. Felt like little paper cuts on my nipples. It took a while to find out that the funnels weren't big enough for me which is why it hurt so bad. Unfortunately, this doesn't come with multiple funnel size options so I had to purchase another breast pump all together. I ended up with the mandela and used the larger funnel. No more pain! If you are more the size of nickles vs dimes this pump isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: It died :(
customer_reviews.text: I received this beginning big November if 2019. And return/refund ended in February. And it suddenly dies not work unless it is plugged in! I exclusively pump and used this with my freemie cups and I NEEDED to have a portable pump. I have give kids and now I can't even move about to care for them . I used to love this pump it was perfect until now. Now i lost out on the money spent for this pump and back to being stuck to a wall
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie k.

customer_reviews.title: good investment for mommy
customer_reviews.text: The best thing of this pump it has a timer so you know exactly how long you have pumped and the memory knows what settings you left it at. As far as the noise, it is a motor. It's going to make a noise. It is quieter than the one my insurance company sent me. I love how easy it is to take apart and clean. I pump more than 3-4 times a day so cleaning is a big part of my day. The pump is portable and I rarely have to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Work pump
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could pump at work and just leave it there and not have to lug a pump back and forth. It worked great. Although once I thought it was going out but it turns out that it was just the usb plug in that I was using. This is a great pump for the value. The extra shields they gave didn’t really fit right so I never used them. Also if anyone uses level 9 to express milk....I tip my hat to you. That thing will suck a watermelon through a garden hose.
customer_reviews.author: Erinn

customer_reviews.title: It works and you get so much more for your money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter in law as we found ourselves in an unforeseen situation and we needed it quick. It not only was so reasonably priced but it arrived the next day and it saved the day. It has so much more to offer than it show s online.. it works amazing she loves it. I honestly picked it because it had my grandbaby name on it so i took it as a sign...Miss Baby Bella who showed up early is eating and finally putting on weight and mommy is producing plenty of milk now...This family outta grateful!
customer_reviews.author: april wade

customer_reviews.title: BETTER then the hospital grade medela!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got out of the nicu with our baby where I used a hospital grade medela breast pump for our baby that was big and had to be carted around everywhere. The lactation consultant told me my breast pump was going to be junk that I had at home but this has ABSOLUTELY proved her wrong. It is wonderfully portable, small enough for the night stand and has a long battery life. I’ve had an amazing milk supply the whole time but I can easily pump enough for 2 feedings in 15 minutes. I usually don’t pump longer then 10-13 minutes. Thank you baby Bella. This is better then the $3,000 hospital pump.
customer_reviews.author: Writersblock

customer_reviews.title: Suction is turbo powered!
customer_reviews.text: Suction power is turbo!! I cant use it past level 1! That's a good and bad thing (its painful after level 1) and I've breastfed 4 other children. Love that its portable, i can use it in the car if needed plus it has a USB charger. Doesn't come with actual charging block but who doesnt have a one these days? Come with cord to charge however. Display is very sensitive to touch, I've accidentally turned up the suction just moving the unit while I was using it. Overall very good just wish there was an in between power level from level 1 of suction.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This is not a closed pump system there is a pin size hole on the side of the flanges that makes it lack any amount of suction. In fact it hardly gets any milk out, I bought this to replace a manual pump I use for work and I wont be replacing it with this pump.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Throw whatever your using away and buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: I just had a Son and his mother was pumping with a Medela but she was about to give up on breastfeeding because she was concerned that he wasn't getting much. She could only get a little under a ounce each pump and it said to pump every 45 minutes thus hurting her.. I switched to this pump and it arrived in the mail today. BOOM! 2 ounces in a single session of pumping. So thankful for making the switch. Now my kid can get the best nutrition instead of formula!!
customer_reviews.author: YrX

customer_reviews.title: received product that appeared to have been used
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a few breast pumps and lots of accessories, this is the first time I received something that was packaged using cling wrap. The pump appears to have been used, shows signs of wear and the screen protector was only on halfway, as if it was removed and then replaced poorly. There were several specks of what I can only assume was dirt in the package, but it really didn't look like dirt or parts of the packaging. Returned item, disappointed, I really wanted to love it. Unfortunately I can't tell you how it worked because I didn't feel comfortable using it.
customer_reviews.author: ksparkles

customer_reviews.title: Suction is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this breast pump after misplacing my other one from insurance when I moved. I didn't know what to expect, however I purchased it based on reviews. I am very happy about the purchase. The different functions are great and the sucking power is awesome. My milk was only in a few days and I was pumping about an ounce from each breast, more than with my last son. I will definalty recommend to my mommy friends
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Pump and Price!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the massage cups as well as all the pump parts being clear. Super easy to clean and put together. The different pump modes are great for switching things up. The battery lasts for two sessions with out needing to be charged. The battery indicator isn’t very trustworthy though because it moves up and down with out being plugged in, but I love the pump all together. I choose this one over the hospital grade one all day long. It hasn’t leaked on me and and all my bottles screw into it. Unlike my other pump. Love love love!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ayanis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Suction!
customer_reviews.text: I retired my Medela PISA after buying this pump. The suction power is way stronger than my medela. I love that it has multiple pump settings, the wide range definitely helps “empty” me better. An obviously plus is it’s portable which is a game changer for exclusive pumpers!
customer_reviews.author: Boshake

customer_reviews.title: Crazy suction
customer_reviews.text: I take this pump into work and around when I travel. Super easy to use, long battery life and easy to charge. It is also pretty quiet. The suction is CRAZY STRONG. I rarely go above a level two suction on any setting, make sure to disconnect if you want to go back to a lower level of suction because you have to cycle through to the highest to get back down to level one. But once you know that it is easy to use. Definitely worth the money and I think comparable to my hospital grade pump in regards to production.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric pump and I love it! It is very lightweight and portable. The clips for the storage bags are a bonus too! Having a heavy flow of milk, I can pump directly into the bags and store it with ease. The pump’s noise level is low enough not to disturb baby’s sleep when in use. The different suction levels are suited for everyone. You can adjust the pump to what is comfortable for you. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump to use in the car while I am working. I did not have high hopes for it due to its price. Let me tell you this pump is now my new favorite and I’m not using my spectra at home anymore. I love that I don’t have to be plugged into a wall and can empty my breasts in 8-12 minutes compared to 20 with my spectra. This pump has been a life saver. The battery lasts more than all day (I pump every 3 hours). It is a bit loud but that isn’t a huge issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Sucked off my nipples.
customer_reviews.text: I felt like this was sucking my nipples off. The latest setting is so powerful! This messed me up so bad that it tooke me days to recover. I was in so much pain, I had to constantly take hot showers to try to relieve the pain, I had to use a heating pad, take new medication to help with the clogged ducts , and massage myself even though a lite touch was almost too much to handle. If the suction was more gentle this would be a great product but holy hell this thing is like a torture device.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: My titties almost fell off
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars. This thing is easy to use, portable, light-weight, all around a great breast pump. My only suggestion is to CHECK SETTINGS BEFORE TURNING ON!! I use level 1-3 usually and this thing goes up to level 9. Turned on level 9 by accident and thought I went to meet my Jesus.
customer_reviews.author: Abby J.

product_meta.title: Bellababy Double Electric Breast Feeding Pumps Pain Free Strong Suction Power Touch Panel High Definition Display
feature_bullets: Bellababy is decated to providing moms quality and affordable breast feeding essentials
🎄 Come with 2 pcs of milk storage bag adapters and 10 pcs of storage bag,moms can express to the milk storage bags directly by the adapters.BPA and Phthalates Free
🎄 Closed System,4 modes and 9 levels of suction for choice,massage and stimulate breasts before pumping,comfortable and pain free.
🎄 High definition Screen,display the working mode,suction level,time and battery status etc clearly
🎄 Sensitive touch panel,click by one finger to operate,easy and convenient.
🎄 Lightweight and portable,2200mAh Li-ion battery built-in,good for travel.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars4,437 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
